page.title: 17 A Wolverhampton Life Style
page.content: Monday mornings I wake up at 7.30am. Breakfast is Weetabix, toast and tea. At 8.45 I leave for school, where I play football until the bell rings at 9.00. Our teacher marks the register. We write our diaries for the weekend. At 9.20 a special lesson helps me. At 10.35 we go out to play. I play football with my friends. After play we watch Zig Zag on BBC2 and do some work about the programme. At 12.00 I have my dinner, salad, carrots, mash and roast potatoes. Then I play football until 1.15pm. For half the afternoon our headteacher takes our class. After playtime our teacher reads a story and we read to her, then change our reading books. At 3.45pm I go home. I play outside, then go to have my tea-usually curry and chapaties. I might watch an Indian film on the television or do some homework. At 9.00pm I go to bed.
